cn.sharesdk.framework

类 Platform.ShareParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.framework.InnerShareParams
      • cn.sharesdk.framework.Platform.ShareParams
  • 直接已知子类:
    Laiwang.ShareParams
    封闭类:
    Platform

    public static class Platform.ShareParams
extends InnerShareParams
    a list of param to share

    ShareParams is used in method Platform.share(ShareParams), each platform has its ShareParams, most of time ShareParams are different between platforms.
